description.lang: Oomi Cube is an intelligent gateway controller, it is not only a Z-Wave Controller but also integrates the other wireless technology and Sensors, e.g. NFC, WI-FI, Bluetooth, Webcam, PIR Sensor, Temperature sensor, Light sensor and so on. Just one intelligent device will give you the perfect smart home.Oomi Cube is a Z-Wave security enabled device and can be operated in any Z-Wave network with other Z-wave certified devicesfrom other manufacturers and/or other applications. All non-battery operated nodes within the network will act as repeaters regardless of vendor to increase reliability of the network.
Z-Wave Plus Lifeline.The Device Reset Locally CC will be sent to the associated nodes in this group when the Cube is reset.
